abilities.name: Spectral Scream
abilities.description: Exhale a deep breath of elemental destruction. Tap to cycle through elements, hold to cast. The chosen element applies to all of Chroma's abilities.

abilities.name: Elemental Ward
abilities.description: Depending on Chroma's elemental alignment, an offensive area-of-effect is created. Chroma and its nearby allies are imbued with defensive energy.

abilities.name: Vex Armor
abilities.description: When Shields are hit, Chroma and nearby allies' Armor grows stronger, when Health takes a hit, Weapon Damage increases.

abilities.name: Effigy
abilities.description: Chroma turns his pelt into a massive sentry that strengthens nearby allies and engulfs enemies in elemental attacks.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Bind the elements and unleash untold destruction with Chroma Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

components.name: Chassis
components.description: Chassis component of the Chroma Prime Warframe.

components.name: Neuroptics
components.description: Neuroptics component of the Chroma Prime Warframe.

components.name: Orokin Cell
components.description: Ancient energy cell from the Orokin era.Locations: Ceres, Saturn, and Deimos.

components.name: Systems
components.description: Systems component of the Chroma Prime Warframe.

description: Bind the elements and unleash untold destruction with Chroma Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.
name: Chroma Prime
passiveDescription: Wings sprout for an additional jump and bullet jump.

patchlogs.name: Update 30.7: Nidus Prime & Plague Star
patchlogs.changes:
Adjusted Chroma Elemental Ward stat display to be more accurate (uses % display for Health/Shield/Armor/reload/holster buffs).
Updated Foundry preview images for Scorched Beacon and Chroma Mark Blueprints (for The New Strange Quest), which were appearing as low resolution images.

patchlogs.name: Nightwave: Prime Vault: Hotfix 30.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Rhino Prime, Nyx Prime, Ankyros Prime, Boltor Prime, Hikou Prime, and Scindo Prime Relics have been added to the drop tables! These Relics have replaced the Zephyr and Chroma Prime Relics in the Void drop tables, Bounties, and Relic Packs.

patchlogs.name: Update 30.5: Sisters of Parvos
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being unable to use the Xoris as a melee weapon after detonating it while Chroma’s Spectral Scream is active.

patchlogs.name: Call of the Tempestarii: TennoGen: Update 30.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Improved stability for systems using out-dated Razer Chroma drivers.

patchlogs.name: Call of the Tempestarii: Prime Vault: Hotfix 30.0.8 + 30.0.8.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Zephyr & Chroma Prime Vault
Zephyr Prime and Chroma Prime return to the Origin System along with their signature Weapons and Customizations for a limited time.
Zephyr Prime, Chroma Prime, Tiberon Prime, Kronen Prime, Rubico Prime, and Gram Prime Relics have been added to the drop tables! These Relics have replaced the Banshee and Mirage Relics in the drop tables, Bounties, and Relic Packs.
Zephyr and Chroma Prime Blueprints and components have had their Ducat values changed as announced here.
Zephyr & Chroma Prime Warframes
Zephyr & Chroma Prime Glyphs
Chroma Prime Warframe
Chroma Prime Glyphs

patchlogs.name: Deimos: Arcana: Hotfix 29.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed activating Aerial Ace while using Chroma resulting in his Passive extra jump being removed and causing the dragon wings to show on double jump instead.

patchlogs.name: Deimos: Arcana: Hotfix 29.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed missing TennoGen skin wings for Chroma’s new passive:

patchlogs.name: Update 29.5: Deimos Arcana
patchlogs.changes:
a Passive that allows Chroma to perform an additional jump / bullet jump while sprouting his Dragon Wings to give him that extra aerial dominance!
In addition to Chroma being able to select elements in mission real-time (the biggest change), Chroma’s selectable element HUD now uses colour coding in addition to icon coding.

patchlogs.name: Heart of Deimos: Hotfix 29.0.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma Immortal skin missing his tail. Pin the Tail on the Dragon.

patchlogs.name: Heart of Deimos: Update 29
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma and Exaclibur with Chromatic Blade equipped missing the active element icon in the Appearance tab.

patchlogs.name: The Steel Path: Inaros Prime 28.2.0 + 28.2.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Chroma Prime, Gram Prime, and Rubico Prime have entered the Vault!

patchlogs.name: The Deadlock Protocol: Hotfix 28.0.6 + 28.0.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when casting Chroma’s Effigy ability.

patchlogs.name: The Deadlock Protocol: Hotfix 28.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when receiving a buff from Chroma’s Vex Armor.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Railjack Revisited (Part 1): Update 27.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma Elemental Ward issue where casting it on yourself through the Railjack Tactical Map, then overriding it with your own cast causing the bonuses from the Tactical Map cast to never expire.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Hotfix 27.2.2
patchlogs.changes:
Increased the base Status Chance of Exalted Blade and Desert Wind to 15%, while also changing the Chromatic Blade and Reactive Storm Augments to stack in the same manner other Status Mods do. This was missed in the Status changes but is a necessary change now. The following reflects the new Maximums: 
Chromatic Blade 50% to 300% Status Chance

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Kuva Lich Changes 27.1.0 + 27.1.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Made a micro-optimization to Chroma's Effigy ability.

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Ivara Prime 27.0.12 + 27.0.12.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Excalibur’s Chromatic Blade elemental FX and statistics on Exalted Blade not updating after you change your Energy colour. Instead, they are stuck on the default Electricity element.

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Ivara Prime 27.0.9
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed an issue where Chroma’s Elemental Ward in the ‘Fire’ mode would subtract health if Operators strayed too far from Warframes. 
Fixed Chroma’s Electric Elemental Ward not responding to Power Duration Mods. 
Fixed a script error in Chroma’s Effigy ability.

patchlogs.name: Update 26: The Old Blood
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Diva Chest Armor clipping through Chroma/Chroma Prime.

patchlogs.name: Saint of Altra: Update 25.7.0
patchlogs.additions: Added Arsenal Ability videos for Chroma, Equinox, and Nezha!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed your Arch-Gun constantly replaying it’s equip animation after casting Chroma’s Spectral Scream ability twice.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 25.4.1 + 25.4.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Updated Chroma’s Vex Armor ability description to include nearby Allies:

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Passive / Spectral Scream descriptions not stating that the Elemental effects are now dictated by the emissives colours, not the energy colours as given in the Ability / Mod descriptions.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Passive / Spectral Scream descriptions not stating that the Elemental effects are now dictated by the emissives colours, not the energy colours as given in the Ability / Mod descriptions.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Graxx Helmet Energy color persisting as default.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Update 25
patchlogs.changes: Primary Energy color will reflect the core (brightest) area of the FX. This allows for a Cold Damage Chroma to have a pink FX, Heat Damage Chroma to have a green FX, etc.

Updated theme texture icons for all Warframe Skins/Helmets for Ash, Atlas, Banshee, Chroma, Ember and Equinox.

patchlogs.changes:
Mask Of The Revenant: Chroma Prime 23.9.0:
Chroma Prime, Gram Prime, and Rubico Prime Relics have replaced all exclusive locations of Limbo Prime, Destreza Prime, and Pyrana Prime Relics:
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed seeing 2 different Energy colors when casting Chroma’s Spectral Scream. 
Fixed Warframe Abilities affecting Dargyns (Chroma’s Elemental Ward) when an ally has mounted it.
Fixed inability to see new Relics for Chroma/Rubico/Gram Prime in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.5

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Razer Chroma effects now play in the Main Menu and when Energy color is changed in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a variety of crashes and bugs when using Razer Chroma effects.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.additions: If you find joy in neon colors flashing to the beat of killing Grineer, plug in that Razer Chroma and enjoy the show! Please note that Razer Chroma and Warframe compatibility is a work-in-progress and more compatibility will be added as we continue to develop it.
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed an issue with back Sigils clipping on the Chroma Dynasty Skin. 
Fixed Clients not able to see the destination circle after they or a squadmate has casted Effigy using Chroma’s Guided Effigy Augment. 
Fixed various Syandana clipping issues through Chroma’s Effigy.
Fixed Chromatic Blade Augment not applying elemental FX on Exalted Blade’s projectiles. 
Fixed Chroma Dynasty Skin clipping into many cloth Syandanas.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Update 20.7.0
patchlogs.changes: Oberon Prime: Update 20.7.0new Augmentsexcalibur (Exalted Blade)Mag (Magnetize)Chroma (Effigy)Volt (Electric Shield)Find These New Augments As Syndicate Offerings Today!Changes:

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.5.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed numerous Syandanas clipping through Chroma’s Dynasty Skin.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.3.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Chroma’s Vex Armor unmodded Damage multiplier ability stat displaying 100% higher than it should've.
Fixed missing sound on Chroma’s Noble animation idle.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.3
patchlogs.changes:
Fixed an issue where Chroma would deal no damage with Vex Armor active. While this may sound like a simple fix, if you're a Chroma user please read on!
Solving Vex Armor actually takes as back to Chroma's beginning. On original power creation, we used some less-than-ideal calculation methods to create Scorn and Fury's effects. If you are an avid Chroma user, you probably know the power maximizing this ability brings. At some point in Chroma's future we will need to revisit and use ideal methods for his Abilities; we will inform you well in advance when Chroma is under review. As you may or may not know, Oberon is currently under review at this time!

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma's Effigy sometimes not doing anything in Captura.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.2.0

Fixed Chroma’s Idle animation not breathing actual fire. 
Fixed Chroma's Dynasty Skin loincloth lingering with the pelt instead of his undersuit when casting Effigy. 
Fixed the Dex Nouchali Syandana clipping on Rhino and Chroma.
Fixed the Ripkas not attaching properly to Chroma’s Dynasty Skin

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20.1.0

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.9

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed (for real this time) Chroma’s Effigy appearing as a full Chroma instead of his pelt.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.2

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes:
Updated the icons for the Chroma Drevni and Chroma Vojnik skins to include shots of the default Helmet (with the skin colours applied) to resolve confusion.
Chroma's Effigy damage increased for all elemental types in Conclave.
Chroma's Vex Armor duration increased in Conclave.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Spectre versions of Mesa and Chroma seen in their respective Quests not properly holstering their weapons.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Equinox (and possibly Chroma) appearing to have a full grown Cyst when in reality it's not mature and ready for curing.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a hitch when casting Chroma’s Effigy if you don't have the default helmet equipped.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.10.1+19.10.1.1
patchlogs.changes: For those players who did not receive the Chroma Blueprint after finishing The New Strange quest, you will now have one in your Inventory upon relogging into the game!

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error with Chroma’s Effigy.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed certain enemies being accessible in the Simulacrum (Chroma, Infested Mesa, etc) and secret-Codex entries being visible for certain enemies.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.changes: The Credit Boost function for the Secura Lecta has changed. Before, you could get on average 11.6x Credits from kills. This chance has changed and now scales with Mastery Rank. At Mastery Rank 8, you'll get on average 2x Credits from kills. This increase continues with your Mastery Rank. At Mastery Rank 18 you'll get on average 4x Credits from kills (capped). No other changes were made regarding synergies (i.e Chroma's Effigy, etc)

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a progression stopping bug in The New Strange quest if the Chroma Chassis was received but never built before Specters of The Rail released.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma appearing to have 2 pelts when activating a Focus ability while Effigy is also active.

patchlogs.name: Recurring Dreams + Hotfix 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Quest and key missions not giving rewards (I.e Chroma Signal Blueprint, etc.) *We're working on a script to fix players who have not received their items and are currently stuck. Our sincerest apologies.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.changes:
Chroma’s Spectral Scream now drains 3 Energy.
Chroma’s Elemental Ward’s Electric elemental discharge effect is now affected by range Mods instead of strength Mods.
Chroma’s Elemental Ward Poison holster and reload speed are now affected by duration Mods instead of strength Mods.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Fire Elemental Ward allowing multiple heals each time they enter the aura.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Rakta Ballistica not sitting on Chroma when holstered.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nullifier Crewmen not nullifying Chroma’s Effigy or Nekros’ Shadows of the Dead summons.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.3: The New Protocols
patchlogs.fixes:
Made small adjustments to Chroma’s Effigy to be less intrusive.
Fixed issue where using Chroma in a Mastery Test would cause enemies to stop spawning.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed error that would prevent Chroma from using powers after deactivating Effigy.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.1.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma playing idle animations when using Spectral Scream as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/428896-chroma-does-idle-animations-during-spectral-scream/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.1.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Effigy being hostile to players if spawned while Chroma is under the effects of the Radiation proc.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.1: Volt Prime
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Chroma’s Vex Armor increasing for shield / health decreases caused by Elemental Ward ending as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/425092-permanent-fury-on-chroma/
Fixed Chroma’s pelt not functioning properly for Clients.
Fixed Chroma’s Effigy giving players a stacking credit boost.  One Effigy per Chroma.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.0.4
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Chroma’s Spectral Scream being affected by rift status.
Fixed Chroma’s Elemental Ward fire AoE being affected by rift status.
Fixed Chroma’s Noble animations displaying a strange hand positioning.
Fixed Chroma’s elemental Ward not properly removing ‘old’ buff when 2+ Chroma activate the ability.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.0.2
patchlogs.changes: ·         Chroma’s alt helmet will no longer appear in player inventories after completing The New Strange Quest.
patchlogs.fixes:
·         Fixed Chroma’s Spectral Scream not equipping a weapon once deactivated if the ability was used while holding a scanner.
·         Fixed Chroma’s Elemental Ward buff showing as 1% off in the HUD in some instances.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.changes: Chroma
patchlogs.fixes:
A master of the deadly elements, Chroma can alter his damage output by changing his energy coloring.
Chroma’s powers include:
Chroma
